Title: Relates to prohibiting mass transit facilities in N.Y. city advertising the sale or use of tobacco products or alcohol
Summary: Prohibits mass transit facilities in a city with a population of one million or more from advertising the sale or use of tobacco products or alcohol.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-mm-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the advertisement of tobacco products and alcohol at mass transit facilities
